nl.naturalis.oaipmh.geneious

Interface IAnnotatedDocumentPostFilter

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    SharedPostFilter

    public interface IAnnotatedDocumentPostFilter
    Filters records from the annotated_document table after they have been converted to AnnotatedDocument instances. Post-filters have access to structured data extracted from the document_xml and plugin_document_xml columns. Post-filters are explicitly allowed to maintain state; one instance is used for all records coming back from the database.
    Author:
    Ayco Holleman
    See Also:
    IAnnotatedDocumentPreFilter, IAnnotatedDocumentSetFilter, ListRecordsHandler

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      boolean accept(AnnotatedDocument ad)
      Whether or not to filter out the provided AnnotatedDocument.
